name: WHITE FLOWERS
description: Les Royales Exclusives collection, one of the most ambitious projects in Creed's 250 years, the masterpiece White Flowers is a statement to the aesthetic world about the legacy, quality and collectability of fragrance as art. Olivier Creed uses hand-picked ingredients of this world to imagine a world that is beyond. Serene and composed, White Flowers is a voyage into spirit and dream.
